fact.original: Ынджера (амх. እንጀራ, [ɨndʒǝra] — хлеб; на русский транслитерируется также как инджера, инджира, ынджэра, ынджира; оромо biddeena; тигринья ጣይታ, ṭayta; сомал. canjeero) — традиционное блюдо эфиопской кухни и кухни других стран Африканского Рога (Эритрея, Джибути, Сомали).
fact.translated: Injera (Amharic እንጀራ, [ɨndʒǝra] — bread; transliterated into Russian as indzhera, indzhira, yndzhera, yndzhira; Oromo biddeena; Tigrinya ጣይታ, ṭayta; Somali canjeero) is a traditional dish of Ethiopian cuisine and the cuisines of other countries in the Horn of Africa (Eritrea, Djibouti, Somalia).

src_context: Ынджера (амх. እንጀራ, [ɨndʒǝra] — хлеб; на русский транслитерируется также как инджера, инджира, ынджэра, ынджира; оромо biddeena; тигринья ጣይታ, ṭayta; сомал. canjeero) — традиционное блюдо эфиопской кухни и кухни других стран Африканского Рога (Эритрея, Джибути, Сомали).

fact.original: Les principales sauces faites à base de viande sont : le tibs (viande d'agneau, de bœuf ou de mouton), le doro wot (poulet et œuf) et le ketfo (viande hachée et crue).
fact.translated: The main sauces made from meat are: tibs (lamb, beef, or sheep meat), doro wot (chicken and egg), and ketfo (minced and raw meat).
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: En ce qui concerne les principales sauces faites à base de viande, il y a le tibs (viande d'agneau, de bœuf ou de mouton, le doro wot (poulet et œuf) et le ketfo (viande hachée et crue).

src_context: La galette d’injera est accompagnée par une variété de sauces que l’on superpose dessus.

Les sauces faites à base de légumes sont : le shiro (pois chiches), le atkilt wot (mélange de carottes, pommes de terre et de chou), l'azifa (lentilles), le mesir wot (mélange de lentilles et d'une sauce bérbéré épicée), et le fasolia (mélange de haricots verts, de carottes et d’oignons caramélisés).
Les principales sauces faites à base de viande sont : le tibs (viande d'agneau, de bœuf ou de mouton), le doro wot (poulet et œuf) et le ketfo (viande hachée et crue).
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Teff seeds are graded according to color, used to make different kinds of injera: nech (white), key or quey (red), and sergegna (mixed).
Teff seeds are graded according to color, used to make different kinds of injera: nech (white), key or quey (red), and sergegna (mixed).
Teff, however, is the preferred grain for making injera, primarily because of its sensory attributes (color, smell, taste).
Teff, however, is the preferred grain for making injera, primarily because of its sensory attributes (color, smell, taste).

fact.original: La surface poreuse de l’injera permet de mieux ramasser les sauces qui seront par la suite nappées dessus.
fact.translated: The porous surface of injera allows for better soaking up of the sauces that will later be poured on top.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: C'est alors cette surface poreuse qui permet de mieux ramasser les sauces qui seront par la suite nappées dessus.

src_context: La surface inférieure de l’injera a une texture relativement lisse à la suite de son contact avec la plaque chauffante.
La surface supérieure de l’injera a une texture poreuse.
La surface poreuse de l’injera permet de mieux ramasser les sauces qui seront par la suite nappées dessus.
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: The injera is baked into large, flat and round pieces.
The dough's viscosity allows it to be poured onto the baking surface, rather than rolled out.
The bottom surface of the injera, which touches the heating surface, has a relatively smooth texture, while the top is porous.
This porous texture makes injera good for scooping up sauces and dishes.

fact.original: Le canjeelo est préparé à partir d’une pâte à base de farine ordinaire, de levure, d’eau tiède et d’une pincée de sel.
fact.translated: The canjeelo is prepared from a dough made with regular flour, yeast, warm water, and a pinch of salt.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: En plus de cela, il existe aussi une variante de l’injera connue sous le nom de canjeelo qui est préparée à partir d’une pâte à base de farine ordinaire, de levure, d’eau tiède et d’une pincée de sel.

src_context: Pour des raisons d’inaccessibilité économiques comme géographiques, elle peut être remplacée par d’autres graines et céréales telles que la farine de blé, le maïs ou l'orge.
Il existe une variante de l’injera connue sous le nom de canjeelo.
Le canjeelo est préparé à partir d’une pâte à base de farine ordinaire, de levure, d’eau tiède et d’une pincée de sel.
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Teff seeds are graded according to color, used to make different kinds of injera: nech (white), key or quey (red), and sergegna (mixed).
Teff seeds are graded according to color, used to make different kinds of injera: nech (white), key or quey (red), and sergegna (mixed).
Injera is central to the dining process in Amhara community, like bread or rice elsewhere and is usually stored in the mesob.
Traditionally, injera is made with just two ingredients: teff flour and water.

fact.original: 制作英杰拉的最重要的谷物是微小的富含铁的苔麸。
fact.translated: The most important grain for making injera is tiny, iron-rich teff.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 制作英杰拉的最重要的谷物是微小的富含铁的苔麸。然后,他的产量受限于一定的中海拔高度并雨量充足的地区,所以对一般家庭来说相对昂贵。因为埃塞俄比亚高原的绝大多数人是贫困农户,他们的种植的粮食自给,小麦、大麦、玉米或大米有时用来代替部分或全部苔麸。在埃塞俄比亚也有不同的品种英杰拉,如nech(白色)、kay(红色)和tikur(黑色)。

src_context: 在也门有类似的食品变种，叫作啦喉赫(英語:lahoh)。
在苏丹有类似的食品变种，叫作kisra。
制作英杰拉的最重要的谷物是微小的富含铁的苔麸。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: When teff is not available, injera is made by fermenting a variety of different grains, including barley, millet, and sorghum.
Teff, however, is the preferred grain for making injera, primarily because of its sensory attributes (color, smell, taste).

The aerobic microbial flora of ersho contains spores of Bacillus species (unable to grow at the low pH of 3.5) and several yeasts (in order of abundance): Candida milleri, Rhodotorula mucilaginosa, Kluyveromyces marxianus, Pichia naganishii and Debaromyces hansenii.

The aerobic microbial flora of ersho contains spores of Bacillus species (unable to grow at the low pH of 3.5) and several yeasts (in order of abundance): Candida milleri, Rhodotorula mucilaginosa, Kluyveromyces marxianus, Pichia naganishii and Debaromyces hansenii.

fact.original: 要制作英杰拉，首先用苔麸粉和麵并用酸味酵头使其发酵数日。
fact.translated: To make injera, first use teff flour and water mixed with a sourdough starter to let it ferment for several days.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 要制作英杰拉,首先用苔麸粉和麵并用酸味酵头使其发酵数日,经过这个处理后英杰拉略带酸味。然后将英杰拉放到专业电炉里或(更常见的)放到陶土板(阿姆哈拉語:mittad ,提格雷尼亚语:mogogo)上靠火烘烤完成。英杰拉接触加热的底面具有相对光滑的手感,而顶面则多孔。这种多孔结构使英杰拉很容易的沾料和卷菜。

src_context: 在埃塞俄比亚有不同的品种英杰拉。
不同品种的英杰拉包括nech(白色)、kay(红色)和tikur(黑色)。
要制作英杰拉，首先用苔麸粉和麵并用酸味酵头使其发酵数日。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Teff flour is gluten-free.
To make injera, teff flour is mixed with water.
Teff seeds are graded according to color, used to make different kinds of injera: nech (white), key or quey (red), and sergegna (mixed).
When teff is not available, injera is made by fermenting a variety of different grains, including barley, millet, and sorghum.

fact.original: 埃塞俄比亚高原的绝大多数人是贫困农户。
fact.translated: The vast majority of people in the Ethiopian highlands are poor farmers.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 制作英杰拉的最重要的谷物是微小的富含铁的苔麸。然后,他的产量受限于一定的中海拔高度并雨量充足的地区,所以对一般家庭来说相对昂贵。因为埃塞俄比亚高原的绝大多数人是贫困农户,他们的种植的粮食自给,小麦、大麦、玉米或大米有时用来代替部分或全部苔麸。在埃塞俄比亚也有不同的品种英杰拉,如nech(白色)、kay(红色)和tikur(黑色)。

src_context: 苔麸的产量受限于一定的中海拔高度并雨量充足的地区。
苔麸对一般家庭来说相对昂贵。
埃塞俄比亚高原的绝大多数人是贫困农户。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Teff production is limited to certain middle elevations with adequate rainfall and is a low-yield crop, so it is relatively expensive for the average farming household.
Many farmers in the Ethiopian highlands grow their own subsistence grains, so wheat, barley, corn, or rice flour are sometimes used to replace the teff content.
Teff flour is ground from the grains of Eragrostis tef, also known as teff, a cereal crop from the Ethiopian Highlands.
Teff flour is ground from the grains of Eragrostis tef, also known as teff, a cereal crop from the Ethiopian Highlands.

fact.original: 然后将英杰拉放到专业电炉里或(更常见的)放到陶土板(阿姆哈拉語:mittad, 提格雷尼亚语:mogogo)上靠火烘烤完成。
fact.translated: Then place the injera in a professional electric oven or, more commonly, on a clay plate (Amharic: mittad, Tigrinya: mogogo) to bake it over the fire.

然后将英杰拉放到专业电炉里或(更常见的)放到陶土板(阿姆哈拉語:mittad, 提格雷尼亚语:mogogo)上靠火烘烤完成。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: In Ethiopia and Eritrea, a variety of stews, salads (during Ethiopian Orthodox fasting, for which believers abstain from most animal products), and more injera (called injera firfir) are placed on the injera for serving.

In Ethiopia and Eritrea, a variety of stews, salads (during Ethiopian Orthodox fasting, for which believers abstain from most animal products), and more injera (called injera firfir) are placed on the injera for serving.
Teff flour is now being produced in the United States by several companies, making teff more accessible to expatriate Ethiopians.
In America, it is often cooked on an aluminum lefse grill.

fact.original: 在吉布提有类似的食品变种，叫作canjeero或lahooh。
fact.translated: In Djibouti, there is a similar food variety called canjeero or lahooh.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 英杰拉(阿姆哈拉語:እንጀራ,羅馬化:ənǧära,[ɨndʒəra];奧羅莫語:Biddeena;提格雷尼亚语:ጣይታ,羅馬化:ṭayta;英語:injera 或 enjera)是一种有独特的海棉质感的发酵后麵饼。传统上采用苔麸(Teff)制作,是埃塞俄比亚和厄立特里亚的国菜。在周边一些国家也有类似的食品变种,如在索马里和吉布提(叫作canjeero或lahooh)、也门(叫作啦喉赫,英語:lahoh)及苏丹(叫作kisra)。

src_context: 英杰拉是厄立特里亚的国菜。
在索马里有类似的食品变种，叫作canjeero或lahooh。
在吉布提有类似的食品变种，叫作canjeero或lahooh。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Teff seeds are graded according to color, used to make different kinds of injera: nech (white), key or quey (red), and sergegna (mixed).
Teff seeds are graded according to color, used to make different kinds of injera: nech (white), key or quey (red), and sergegna (mixed).
White-grained teff is more expensive to buy and thus symbolizes a higher status than its cheaper counterpart, red-grained teff.
There are similar variants to injera in other African countries, namely Sudan, Chad and Kenya.

fact.original: 英杰拉是埃塞俄比亚的国菜。
fact.translated: Injera is the national dish of Ethiopia.
fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 英杰拉(阿姆哈拉語:እንጀራ,羅馬化:ənǧära,[ɨndʒəra];奧羅莫語:Biddeena;提格雷尼亚语:ጣይታ,羅馬化:ṭayta;英語:injera 或 enjera)是一种有独特的海棉质感的发酵后麵饼。传统上采用苔麸(Teff)制作,是埃塞俄比亚和厄立特里亚的国菜。在周边一些国家也有类似的食品变种,如在索马里和吉布提(叫作canjeero或lahooh)、也门(叫作啦喉赫,英語:lahoh)及苏丹(叫作kisra)。

src_context: 英杰拉(阿姆哈拉語:እንጀራ,羅馬化:ənǧära,[ɨndʒəra];奧羅莫語:Biddeena;提格雷尼亚语:ጣይታ,羅馬化:ṭayta;英語:injera 或 enjera)是一种有独特的海棉质感的发酵后麵饼。

tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Outside of Ethiopia and Eritrea, injera may be found in grocery stores and restaurants specializing in Ethiopian and Eritrean cooking.
Injera is the most important component of food in Ethiopia and Eritrea.

Injera (Amharic: እንጀራ, romanized: ənǧära, [ɨndʒəra];  Tigrinya: ጣይታ, romanized: ṭayta; Oromo: budeena) is a sour fermented pancake-like flatbread with a slightly spongy texture, traditionally made of teff flour.
In Ethiopia and  Eritrea, injera is a staple.
